items.name: About MTI
items.description: Our organisation's vision, mission, structure and values.

items.name: People at MTI
items.description: There are altogether nine statutory boards and one government department under the Ministry’s purview.

items.name: MTI Family
items.description: There are altogether nine statutory boards and one government department under the Ministry’s purview.

items.name: Free Trade Agreements
items.description: Free Trade Agreements are treaties which make trade and investment between two or more economies easier. Find out more here.

items.name: International Investment Agreements
items.description: Singapore's International Investment Agreements promote investment flows between the signatory countries. Find out more here.

items.name: Digital Economy Agreements
items.description: A Digital Economy Agreement (DEA) is a treaty that establishes digital trade rules and digital economy collaborations between two or more economies.

items.name: Green Economy Agreements
items.description: Green Economy Agreements (GEA) foster common rules and standards that promote trade and investment in green goods, services and technologies; develop interoperable policy frameworks; and catalyse technology development and cooperative projects.

items.name: Multilateral and Regional Forums
items.description: Singapore supports multilateral and region forums that promote free and open trade. Find out more here.

items.name: Indo-Pacific Economic Framework for Prosperity (IPEF)
items.description: The IPEF is a platform for countries in the region to collaborate on advancing resilient, sustainable, and inclusive economic growth. Find out more here.

items.name: US-Singapore Partnership for Growth and Innovation
Speeches
items.description: Read the speeches delivered by our political appointees and senior management here.

items.name: Parliamentary Replies
items.description: Read our responses to questions raised in the Singapore Parliament here.

items.name: Forum Letter Replies
items.description: Read our replies to letters to the Forum here.

items.name: Key Economic Indicators
items.description: Key statistical data such as on the labour market, productivity, industrial production, investments, retail activity, tourism and trade are available here.

items.name: Economic Survey of Singapore
items.description: Read the Economic Survey of Singapore, which we produce on a quarterly basis, here. Each report contains analyses of the overall Singapore economy and its various economic sectors.

items.name: Feature Articles
items.description: Additional articles on economics and trade issues, published on an ad-hoc basis, are posted here.

items.name: Publications
items.description: The list of publications available are posted here. It covers emerging issues that could transform Singapore's economy, as well as economic plans or reports such as the Report of the Committee on the Future Economy.
